Pre-Game Insights: Bulgaria got their Nations League campaign off to a solid start by securing a 0-0 away draw with Belarus.
Ranked at 88 in the world by FIFA, Bulgaria have bottomed out in recent years and are trying to slowly rebuild.
Northern Ireland got their Nations League campaign off to a winning start with a 2-0 victory over Luxembourg.
Northern Ireland is in a rebuilding process under Michael O’Neill, who was re-appointed in December 2022.
Under O’Neill, Ireland has won six from 15, with the emergence of youngsters like Liverpool right-back Conor Bradley greatly helping the team.
